author: ebrondol
body:
This PR is going to fix the SiStripClusterChargeCut for phase2 tracking iteration, i.e. from `SiStripClusterChargeCutLoose` to `SiStripClusterChargeCutNone`. Since the `SiStripClusters` are not used in the phase2 tracking reco, the effect expected on performance is null. This change is done just to be consistent with the other iteration setting.

Results for TTbar are:
![pr16680](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5331004/20922058/213b0ec2-bba7-11e6-945d-bc98e2b3ffda.png)
title: Phase 2 - Fix TrajectoryFilter for Initial- and HighPtSteps
